update is garbage. first is when you pick a new place in your destination. it will reroute to default route and not the route chosen. Secondly, the truck stops, and distances are off. The last thing it glitches more, and i have uninstalled and reinstalled. I loved the app before, but now it almost is like a waste of money.

I've been trying to cancel this service for over a year and I keep getting charged 32.57 per month for diamond service. this company is in for a lawsuit if they don't stop charging me and regions me for at least 12 months.

The app won't let me do a monthly gold subscription because it starts with a free 7 day free trial. I just need the monthly subscription without being forced to get an annual subscription to get the gold perks. Big L Trucker Path

The app works great. I am trying to buy the annual subscription for diamond, witch is supposed to be 249 a year, but in reality is asking for 369. 7 day TRIAL IS a trick and will automatically subscribe you for one year, and you can't get out of it. (With Gold Version) Bloated with fuel advertising/ question pop-ups. Slow app compared to others, especially when "looking for route" loading must be server based because its slow. Very, very slim or no useful/ current road construction/ closed road data. *Random detour off, then on a good road that was unessasary. *Toll calculator is wrong by a lot. Reality= $50.90 (State website), app= $22

NOT RECOMMEND!! Used to be a great app a few years ago. Q:1 how do I shut off all the unnecessary alert? ie: animal ahead, curve ahead ect.. all useless Q:2 what happened to the driver reviews? Places that had hundreds of reviews now show 2-10? Seems like the app wants to cater to businesses NOT the driver by allowing compaies to remove reviews and start advertising regardless of whether I have them selected or not. After yrs of the yearly subscriptions, We will not be re-upping anymore.
Don't use the fuel option it doesn't work and there just stealing your money for 24hrs! You can't call them or message them. My bank will know this is a fraud charge.

I'm going to be almost 3 hours late for my delivery now, and there's nothing I can do about it thanks alot.

Rest in peace, my friend. You were close to us, but you sold out. Thanks for the good times, and may the ground be soft under you. In short: they sold out. Because there’s a weigh station there.

Since latest update 11/16/24. Apparently actual truck stops have been deleted from this app. I can only assume it's because of blackmail. If the truck stop won't pay the blackmail to be put on the app. They get deleted. Case in point. T/A Near Hickory NC and Loves travel center near Marion NC. Both have been deleted from the app. Why, probably because of greed and politics. The owners of the app are probably still crying because Trump won the Election.

I try to reorder them back and it often won't let me set them to where they need to be. I usually have to clear the whole trip out and create the plan anew. Sometimes it tries to route me back to a previous stop. After I tried one last time to view the trip plan to get ETA for today's stops, it scrambled them again. Also, it uses Google Speech for spoken directions. This is significantly quieter than music if provided on the same device and there doesn't seem to be any way to fix that.

it was a great app. Then they added a 4th tab for parking availability. Before, the color of the pin represented the parking availability and showed the truck stop logo. Now, you can either know what the availability is or what truck stop it is in the map view. Now, it just shows a "P" and is red yellow or green. Or the truck stop logo and all the pins are red. Why would they do this? You now have to click more to know the same amount of information. Also, If you search for a place and click "show on map", the only pin you see is that one place. Now go back to the main map and you lost that location and have no way of returning without scrolling with your finger and hoping to find that location just so you know what else is in that area. This app was not developed with the fact that 99% of the time it is being used while driving. It isn't designed by drivers and the developers really don't understand the concept of being user friendly. It has potential but they currently have no desire to make things easier to use, the proof is that 4th parking availability tab. I don't want to give comments a thumbs up or down, this isn't YouTube. I want to find a place to park so I can get some rest. I emailed my inquiry and they responded with an automated response thanking me for my input, no actual conversation about why they changed it and how it is supposedly safer to click more while you are driving. They have made it less safe and don't care about it. I canceled my subscription, they don't get anymore of my money.
